events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days and the package is really late. Can you help?
The reported problem involves delayed delivery and an unresponsive tracking status, indicating a Delivery Delay cluster.
Assigning this case to delivery support team to investigate the delay and provide an update.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand your package is delayed, and I’m here to help get this resolved as soon as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number so I can check the latest status with the courier?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and the tracking code is ZX123456789US. Thank you for looking into this.
I’ve contacted the shipping provider and they confirmed the package is delayed due to weather disruptions. We expect delivery within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I’m disappointed but appreciate you checking and explaining the situation clearly.
Your package has been delivered successfully as per the latest shipment confirmation. Please let us know if everything is in order.
Just following up to confirm that your package arrived and you have no further issues. We appreciate your patience during the delay.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and feel free to reach out for any future concerns.
